data.caption:
Intimation Of Book Closure Pursuant To Regulation 42 Of SEBI
(Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015
data.news_body:
We hereby inform that the 60th Annual General Meeting of the Company will be held on Tuesday 16th September 2025 at 1200 hours through video conferencing (VC)/ other audio visual means (OAVM). Accordingly pursuant to Regulation 42 of SEBI (LODR) Reg 2015 the Register and Share Transfer Books of the company will be remain closed from 12th September 2025 to 16th September 2025(both days inclusive)
The cut off date for determining eligibility of the Shareholder to vote at the AGM is 9th September 2025 and the e-voting will commence from Friday 12th September 2025 at 09:00 A.M to Monday 16th September 2025 at 5:00 P.M to enable shareholders to caste their  vote on  the proposed resolutions electronically

data.caption: Intimation Of Record Date Pursuant To Regulation 42 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015
data.news_body:
We hereby inform that the Board of Directors have recommended dividend of Rs. 2.90/- per Equity Share of Face Value of Rs. 10 each for the financial year 2024-25 subject to the approval of Shareholders at the ensuing Annual General Meeting to be held on Tuesday 16th September 2025.
Pursuant to Regulation 42 of SEBI (LODR) 2015 the company has fixed Tuesday 9th September 2025  as the "Record Date" for determining entitlement of Shareholders for the payment of Dividend for the Financial Year 2024-25

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of The SEBI (LODR) Regulations(Recommendation Of Dividend)
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of India Tourism Development Corporation Limited
(ITDC) have in its meeting held on 30th May 2025 recommended a dividend of Rs.2.90 per share on
the equity share capital of the company aggregating an amount of Rs. 248731260/- for the financial
year ended March 31 2025

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting And Submission Of Audited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results For The Quarter & Year Ended March 31 2025
data.news_body: Enclosed herewith the Audited Financial Results Standalone and Consolidated for the quarter and year ended March 31 2025

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting And Submission Of Audited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results For The Quarter & Year Ended March 31 2025
data.news_body: Enclosed herewith the Audited Financial Results Standalone and Consolidated for the quarter and year ended March 31 2025

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting And Submission Of Audited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results For The Quarter & Year Ended March 31 2025
data.news_body:
Enclosed herewith please find the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) in the prescribed format under Regulation 33 of SEBI (LODR) Regulation 2015 along with Auditors Report thereon (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter & year ended March 31 2025.
  
The results have been reviewed by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors in their meeting held on Friday the 30th day of May 2025. The Auditor has qualified the report hence the statement of impact of Auditors qualification is also being attached with the financial results.

Further Pursuant to Regulation 43 of SEBI (LODR) Regulation 2015 the Board of Directors of the Company has recommended a dividend of Rs.2.90 per share on the equity share capital of the company aggregating an amount of Rs. 248731260/- for the financial year ended March 31 2025.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Our Letter Dated 22.05.2025 Regarding Prior Intimation For Audit Committee And Board Meeting Scheduled On The 29Th May 2025 At 1500 Hours And 1545 Hours For Consideration Of Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Year E
data.news_body:
India Tourism Development Corporation Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 30/05/2025 inter alia to consider and approve ITDC is a Government Company in which the nominee of the Government of India being the IAS are also appointed as Director.
Due to some emergent high level meeting with the Government officials the Government Nominee Director was unable to attend the Audit Committee meeting and the Board meeting hence it is decided that the Audit Committee and the Board Meeting for consideration of the Audited Financial Results for the quarter and year ended 31st March 2025 which was scheduled today i.e. 29th day of May 2025 at 1500 hours and 1545 hours respectively will be rescheduled tomorrow i.e. 30th day of May2025 at 1100 hours and 1200 hours respectively. The Audit Committee Meeting will be held on 30th day of May 2025 at 1100 hours and Board meeting will be held on 30th day of May 2025 at 1200 hours.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Of Board Meeting For Consideration Of Audited Financial Results (Standalone And Consolidated) Of The Company For The Financial Year And Quarter Ended March 31 2025
data.news_body: India Tourism Development Corporation Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 29/05/2025 inter alia to consider and approve In terms of Regulation 29 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 this is to inform that Audit Committee Meeting and Board Meeting inter alia for discussing and approving the Audited Financial Results (Consolidated and Standalone) for the year and quarter ended 31st March 2025 and to recommend the dividend if any will be held on Thursday the 29th day of May 2025.

data.caption: Intimation For Appointment Of Independent Director
data.news_body:
Pursuant to clause 61 of the Articles of Association Ministry of Tourism Govt. of India vide order file no PSU-6/1/2025-PSU dated 15.05.2025 communicated that Appointment Committee of cabinet has approved the appointment of Sh. Malay Sinha as Non-official Director (NoD) on the board of India Tourism Development Corporation(ITDC) for a period of three years. The formal process of appointment of Sh. Sinha is under way and Sh. Sinha is yet to obtain a DIN.
This is further to inform that disclosure regarding non-debarred from holding the office of Director pursuant to order of SEBI or any other such authority and the brief profile is yet to be received from Sh. Sinha and will be provided after receipt of the same.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Credit Rating
data.news_body: Pursuant to Reg 30 read with Part A of Schedule III of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform that CARE the credit rating agency has assigned its highest rating "CARE A1+" for short term bank facilities.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body: Ministry of Tourism Govt. of India vide OM No. EON. PSU-6/1/2019  dated 28.04.2025 has informed that the Appointment Committee of the Cabinet (ACC) has approved the appointment of Ms. Mugdha Sinha IAS (RJ:99) Director General(Tourism) Ministry of Tourism as Managing Director(MD) India Tourism Development Corporation Ltd Ministry of Tourism in the rank and pay of Additional Secretary to the Govt of India.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body: Ministry of Tourism Govt of India vide order dated 16.04.2025 communicated that the Appointment Committee of Cabinet has approved the re-appointment of Professor Dr. Manan Kaushal as Non-official Director (NoD) on the board of ITDC for a period of One (01) year w.e.f 16.04.2025 or until further orders whichever is earlier.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Cessation
data.news_body: ITDC informs the stock exchange that the tenure of Shri M.R. Synrem Managing Director has expired on 10.04.2025

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body: Ministry of Tourism vide its order EON No. 6/3/2022 dated 10.03.2025 has informed that the Appointment Committee of the Cabinet (ACC) has approved the appointment of Mr. Rajesh Rana as Director ( Commercial & Marketing) ITDC for a  period of 5 years w.e.f. the date of assumption of Charge of the post or until further orders whichever is earlier. Accordingly  Mr. Rajesh Rana took over the charge of the post of Director (Commercial & Marketing) w.e.f today i.e 17.03.2025.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Diversification / Disinvestment
data.news_body: It is informed that the Board in the meeting scheduled on 11th March 2025 discussed the agenda item. The presentation was given  by the consultant. After discussion Board decided that since the quorum as per Regulation 17(2A) of SEBI (LODR) 2015 was not present. The agenda would be considered when the quorum is present.

data.news_body: Trading window for trading in the shares of ITDC shall remain closed with immediate effect from Tuesday 4th March 2025 to Thursday 13th March 2025 or till 48 hours after the announcement of Board decision in the meeting held on 11.03.2025.

data.caption: Update on board meeting
data.news_body:
The Board Meeting to be held on 13/02/2025 has been revised to 13/02/2025 This has reference to our earlier intimation dated February 06 2025 regarding intimation of Board Meeting to be held on Thursday February 13 2025 at 1630 hours. It may please be noted that due to certain exigencies the meeting of the Board of Directors is now re-scheduled to be held on same day i.e. Thursday February 13 2025 at 1430 hours.

In terms of Regulation 29 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 this is to inform that Audit Committee Meeting and Board Meeting inter alia for discussing and approving the Un-Audited Financial Results (Consolidated and Standalone) for the quarter ended on 31st December 2024 will now be held on Thursday the 13th day of February 2025 at 1400 hours and 1430 hours respectively at Board Room Ashok Hotel Chankyapuri Delhi- 110021

data.news_body:
INDIA TOURISM DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 13/02/2025 inter alia to consider and approve In terms of Regulation 29 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and
Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 this is to inform that Audit Committee Meeting and Board Meeting inter alia
for discussing and approving the Un-Audited Financial Results (Consolidated and Standalone) for the quarter ended on 31st December 2024 will be held on Thursday the 13th day of
February 2025 at 1600 hours and 1630 hours respectively at Board Room Ashok Hotel Chanakyapuri Delhi- 110021

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body: In continuation to the letter dated 11.10.2024 it may be submitted that today i.e 04.02.2025 MOT has communicated the extension for entrustment of the additional charge of the post of Managing Director- ITDC to Shri M.R. Synrem IAS for the period of 6 months w.e.f 11.10.2024 or till the assumption of charge of the psot by the regular incumbent or until further orders whichever is the earliest.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Cessation
data.news_body: Pursuant to the provisions of Regulation 30 and Schedule III of SEBI(LODR) Regulations 2015 it is to inform that the tenure of two independent directors i.e Shri Manan Kaushal and Smt Anju Bajpai have been completed on 23.01.2025 and consequently they have ceased to be the independent diercrtors of the Company w.e.f 24.01.2025.

data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 34 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, we submit herewith the Annual Report 2023-24 along with Notice of 59th Annual General Meeting of the Company for the Financial Year ended 31st March, 2024.

data.caption: Intimation Of Record Date Pursuant To Regulation 42 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body: We hereby inform that the Board of Directors have recommended dividend of Rs. 2.52/- per Equity Share of Face Value of Rs. 10/- each for the Financial Year 2023-24, subject to the approval of shareholders at the ensuing AGM to be held on 6th September, 2024. Pursuant to Regulation 42 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 the Company has fixed 30.08.2024 as the Record Date for determining entitlement of shareholders for payment of Dividend for the Financial Year 2023-24

data.caption: Intimation Of Book Closure Pursuant To Regulation 42 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body: We hereby inform that the 59th Annual General Meeting of the Company will be held on 6th September, 2024 at 1200  hrs through video conferencing/ other audio visual means. Accordingly, Pursuant to Regulation 42 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015, the Register and Share Transfer Book will remain closed from 02.09.2024 to 06.09.2024 (both days inclusive). The cut off date for determining the eligibility of Shareholders to vote at the AGM is 30.08.2024 and the e-voting will commence from 03.09.2024 at 9.00 a.m. to 05.09.2024 at 5.00 p.m. to enable shareholders to cast their vote on the proposed resolutions electronically.

data.caption: Submission Of Newspaper Advertisement Pertaining To Un-Audited Financial Results Of The Company For The First Quarter  Ended June 30, 2024.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 47 of SEBI(LODR) Regulations, 2015, as amended, please find enclosed herewith the copies of Newspaper Advertisement pertaining to the Un-audited Financial Results of the Company for the First quarter ended 30th June, 2024. The Advertisements were published in ''Hindustan Times- Delhi Edition'' (in English), ''Hindustan Times- Mumbai Edition'' (in English and ''Hindustan- Delhi Edition'' (in Hindi) newspapers on 14th August 2024.

data.caption: Un-Audited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results For The Quarter Ended June 30, 2024
data.news_body: Please find enclosed herewith the Unaudited Financial Statements along with the Limited Review Report for the quarter ended 30 June, 2024. The results have been approved by the Audit Committee and the Board in the meeting held on 13.08.2024.

data.caption: Un-Audited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results For The Quarter Ended June 30, 2024
data.news_body: Please find enclosed herewith the Unaudited Financial Statements along with the Limited Review Report for the quarter ended 30 June, 2024. The results have been approved by the Audit Committee and the Board in the meeting held on 13.08.2024.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Consideration Of Un-Audited Financial Results (Standalone And Consolidated) Of The Company For The Quarter Ended June 30, 2024
data.news_body: INDIA TOURISM DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 13/08/2024 ,inter alia, to consider and approve INDIA TOURISM DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION LTD. has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 13/08/2024 ,inter alia, to consider and approve In terms of Regulation 29 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015, this is to inform that Audit Committee Meeting and Board Meeting inter alia for discussing and approving the Un-Audited Financial Results (Consolidated and Standalone) for the quarter ended on 30th June, 2024 will be held on Tuesday, the 13th day of August, 2024 at 1500 hours and 1530 hours respectively at Board Room, Ashok Hotel, Chankyapuri Delhi- 110021

data.news_body: We are enclosing the Confirmation Certificate received from Kfin Technologies Limited, Registrar and Share Transfer Agent of ITDC as per Regulation 74(5) of SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulation, 2018 for the quarter ended 30th June 2024.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Please find enclosed notice regarding closure of trading window for trading of share(s) of ITDC from Monday, 1st July, 2024 to Friday, 16th August, 2024 or till 48 hours after declaration of Un-audited Financial Results for the First Quarter ended on 30th June, 2024 whichever is later, due to Un-audited Financial Results for the quarter ended 30th June, 2024 to be placed before the Audit Committee and Board in the meeting expected to be scheduled by 14th day of August, 2024.

data.caption: Ref: Corporate Announcement Dated 24.05.2023 : Filing Of Additional Details Required For Corporate Announcement Filed Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015.
data.news_body: This is in reference to the Corporate Announcement dated 24.05.2023 and pursuant to email dated 26.05.2023 regarding non-submission of additional details required for filing the Corporate Announcement. In this regards, please find enclosed herewith find the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) along with Auditors Report thereon for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2023. with additional information mentioned below.The results have been reviewed by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors in their meeting held on 24th May, 2023. Auditors have qualified the report, statements of impact of Auditors qualification has been sent separately. Further, Board of Directors of the Company has recommended a dividend of 22% i.e. Rs.2.20 per share on the equity share capital aggregating an amount of Rs. 18,86,92,680/- for the financial year ended March 31, 2023.Time of commencement of Meeting  : 1550 HoursTime of conclusion of Meeting   : 2015 Hours

data.caption: Submission Of Statements Of Impact Of Auditors Qualification
data.news_body: This is with reference to earlier announcement dtd 24th May, 2023 subjected with 'Outcome of Board Meeting and Submission of Audited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and Year ended March 31, 2023'.We are enclosing herewith statements of impact of Auditors qualification for the financial year ended March 31, 2023.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting And Submission Of Audited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended March 31, 2023
data.news_body:
Enclosed herewith please find the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) in the prescribed format under Regulation 33 of SEBI (LODR) Regulation 2015 along with Auditors Report thereon (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2023.

The results have been reviewed by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors in their meeting held on 24th May, 2023. Auditors have qualified the report, statements of impact of Auditors qualification is being sent separately.

Further, Pursuant to Regulation 43 of SEBI (LODR) Regulation 2015, the Board of Directors of the Company has recommended a dividend of 22% i.e. Rs.2.20 per share on the equity share capital of the company aggregating an amount of Rs. 18,86,92,680/- for the financial year ended March 31, 2023.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting And Submission Of Un-Audited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results For The Quarter & Nine Months Ended December 31, 2022
data.news_body:

2. The results have been reviewed by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors in their meeting held on 07th February, 2023.

3. The Meeting of Board of Director of the Company commenced at 11:30 A.M. and concluded at 03:00 P.M.

Sarawgi & Company, and M/s Doogar & Associates, Statutory Auditor thereon (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter & half year ended September 30, 2022. The results have been reviewed by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors in their meeting held on 10th November, 2022.The Board Meeting was concluded at 6:15 P.M. on 10th November, 2022.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting And Submission Of Audited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended March 31, 2022
data.news_body:
Enclosed herewith please find the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) in the prescribed format under Regulation 33 of SEBI (LODR) Regulation 2015 along with Auditors Report thereon (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2022.
2 The results have been reviewed by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors in their meeting held on 14th June, 2022. Auditors have qualified the report, statements of impact of Auditors qualification is being sent separately.

data.caption: Submission Of Un-Audited (Standalone} And (Consolidated} Financial Results For The Third Quarter Ended On 31St December, 2021.
data.news_body:
Enclosed herewith please find the Un-audited (Standalone) and (Consolidated) Financial Results as per Regulation 33 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 for the Third Quarter and Nine months ended on 31st December, 2021. The results have been reviewed by the Audit Committee in its meeting held on 14.02.2022 and have approved by the Board of Directors
in their meeting held on 14.02.2022.
We are also enclosing herewith the Limited Review Report given by M/s J.K. Sarawgi & Company, Chartered Accountant, Statutory Auditor on the Un-Audited (Standalone) and (Consolidated) Financial Results for period mentioned above.

data.caption: Submission Of Un-Audited (Standalone) And {Consolidated) Financial Results For The Second Quarter And Half Year Ended On 30Th September 2021.
data.news_body:
Enclosed herewith please find the Un-audited (Standalone) and (Consolidated) Financial Results as per Regulation 33 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 for the Second Quarter and Half Year ended on 30th September 2021. The results have been seen by the Audit Committee. Since the Audit committee meeting does not have requisite quorum due to no Independent Directors in the committee, the Committee has forwarded the results to the Board for consideration. After considering the results, board approved the same.

We are also enclosing herewith the Limited Review Report given by M/s J.K. Sarawgi & Company, Chartered Accountant, Statutory Auditor on the Un-Audited (Standalone) and (Consolidated) Financial Results for period mentioned above.
